titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on fan assisted, plugin, scented oil dispensing, electrothermic appliances.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on fan assisted, plugin, scented oil dispensing, electrothermic appliances.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on fan assisted, plugin, scented oil dispensing, electrothermic appliances.
